text: avarkal mitu (ivarril oru) vetanai varumpotellam avarkal (musavai nokki) â€˜â€˜musave! Um iraivan (unkal pirarttanaiyai ankikarippataka) umakku alittirukkum vakkurutiyinpati (inta ciramattai nikkumpati) namakkaka nir pirarttanai ceyyunkal. Namatu ciramattai ninkal nikkinal niccayamaka nankal um'mai nampikkai kontu israyilin cantatikalaiyum niccayamaka nam um'mutan anuppi vitukirom'' enru kuruvarkal
